alert.note: Alert for Perry (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 25 at 1:12PM CDT until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Flood Advisory for... Perry County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 112 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated slow moving showers and thunderstorms producing heavy rainfall over the advisory area. Some locations may quickly receive up to 2 inches of rain in a short period of time. Excessive runoff from heavy rainfall over saturated grounds will lead to flooding of urban and low lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Richton, Beaumont, New Augusta, Ferguson, Wingate, Mahned, Hintonville, Oak Grove, Little Creek, Belleville, Janice, McSwain, Progress, Barbara, East Side, Brewer, Good Hope and Deep Creek.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
